verses.verse: ALEPH. <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are the <S%H8549>undefiled<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>, who <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. undefiled: or, perfect, or, sincere
<S%H835>Blessed<s%> are they that <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>, and that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him with the whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
They also <S%H6466>do<s%> no <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>: they <S%H1980>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> <S%H3966>diligently<s%>.
O <S%H305>that<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> were <S%H3559>directed<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>!
Then shall I not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, when I have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto all thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.

I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee with <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>, when I shall have <S%H3925>learned<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%>. thy: Heb. judgments of thy righteousness
I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>: O <S%H5800>forsake<s%> me not <S%H3966>utterly<s%>.
BETH. Wherewithal shall a young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H2135>cleanse<s%> his <S%H734>way<s%>? by taking <S%H8104>heed<s%> thereto according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
With my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%> have I <S%H1875>sought<s%> thee: O let me not <S%H7686>wander<s%> from thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
Thy <S%H565>word<s%> have I <S%H6845>hid<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart<s%>, that I might not <S%H2398>sin<s%> against thee.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> art thou, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
With my <S%H8193>lips<s%> have I <S%H5608>declared<s%> all the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
I have <S%H7797>rejoiced<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>, as much as <S%H5921>in<s%> all <S%H1952>riches<s%>.
I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>, and have <S%H5027>respect<s%> unto thy <S%H734>ways<s%>.
I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in thy <S%H2708>statutes<s%>: I will not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
GIMEL. Deal <S%H1580>bountifully<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that I may <S%H2421>live<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
<S%H1540>Open<s%> thou mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, that I may <S%H5027>behold<s%> wondrous <S%H6381>things<s%> out of thy <S%H8451>law<s%>. Open: Heb. Reveal
I am a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>: <S%H5641>hide<s%> not thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> from me.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1638>breaketh<s%> for the <S%H8375>longing<s%> that it hath unto thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> at all <S%H6256>times<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H1605>rebuked<s%> the <S%H2086>proud<s%> that are <S%H779>cursed<s%>, which do <S%H7686>err<s%> from thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
<S%H1556>Remove<s%> from me <S%H2781>reproach<s%> and <S%H937>contempt<s%>; for I have <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
<S%H8269>Princes<s%> also did <S%H3427>sit<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> against me: but thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> did <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
Thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also are my <S%H8191>delight<s%> and my <S%H582>counsellors<s%> <S%H6098><s%>. my counsellors: Heb. men of my counsel
DALETH. My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1692>cleaveth<s%> unto the <S%H6083>dust<s%>: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> thou me according to thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I have <S%H5608>declared<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and thou <S%H6030>heardest<s%> me: <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
Make me to <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>: so shall I <S%H7878>talk<s%> of thy wondrous <S%H6381>works<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H1811>melteth<s%> for <S%H8424>heaviness<s%>: <S%H6965>strengthen<s%> thou me according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>. melteth: Heb. droppeth
<S%H5493>Remove<s%> from me the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H8267>lying<s%>: and grant me thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H2603>graciously<s%>.
I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H530>truth<s%>: thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> have I <S%H7737>laid<s%> before me.
I have <S%H1692>stuck<s%> unto thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>: O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, put me not to <S%H954>shame<s%>.
I will <S%H7323>run<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, when thou shalt <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
HE. <S%H3384>Teach<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H1870>way<s%> of thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>; and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> it unto the <S%H6118>end<s%>.
Give me <S%H995>understanding<s%>, and I shall <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>; yea, I shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> it with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Make me to <S%H1869>go<s%> in the <S%H5410>path<s%> of thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>; for therein do I <S%H2654>delight<s%>.
<S%H5186>Incline<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%>, and not to <S%H1215>covetousness<s%>.
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from <S%H7200>beholding<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>; and <S%H2421>quicken<s%> thou me in thy <S%H1870>way<s%>. Turn: Heb. Make to pass
<S%H6965>Stablish<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, who is devoted to thy <S%H3374>fear<s%>.
Turn <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach<s%> which I <S%H3025>fear<s%>: for thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H2896>good<s%>.
Behold, I have <S%H8373>longed<s%> after thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
VAU. Let thy <S%H2617>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> also unto me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, even thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%>, according to thy <S%H565>word<s%>.

So shall I have <S%H1697>wherewith<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> him that <S%H2778>reproacheth<s%> me: for I <S%H982>trust<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>. So: or, So shall I answer him that reproveth me in a thing
And <S%H5337>take<s%> not the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H3966>utterly<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; for I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
So shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> and <S%H5703>ever<s%>.
And I will <S%H1980>walk<s%> at <S%H7342>liberty<s%>: for I <S%H1875>seek<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>. at liberty: Heb. at large
I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> of thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%> also before <S%H4428>kings<s%>, and will not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
And I will <S%H8173>delight<s%> myself in thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I have <S%H157>loved<s%>.
My <S%H3709>hands<s%> also will I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> unto thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I have <S%H157>loved<s%>; and I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
ZAIN. <S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, upon which thou hast caused me to <S%H3176>hope<s%>.
This is my <S%H5165>comfort<s%> in my <S%H6040>affliction<s%>: for thy <S%H565>word<s%> hath <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have had me <S%H3966>greatly<s%> in <S%H3887>derision<s%>: yet have I not <S%H5186>declined<s%> from thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
I <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and have <S%H5162>comforted<s%> myself.
<S%H2152>Horror<s%> hath taken <S%H270>hold<s%> upon me because of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
Thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%> have been my <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H4033>pilgrimage<s%>.
I have <S%H2142>remembered<s%> thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and have <S%H8104>kept<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
This I had, because I <S%H5341>kept<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
CHETH. Thou art my <S%H2506>portion<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: I have <S%H559>said<s%> that I would <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H1697>words<s%>.
I <S%H2470>intreated<s%> thy <S%H6440>favour<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>: be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me according to thy <S%H565>word<s%>. favour: Heb. face
I <S%H2803>thought<s%> on my <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> unto thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
I made <S%H2363>haste<s%>, and <S%H4102>delayed<s%> not to <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
The <S%H2256>bands<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H5749>robbed<s%> me: but I have not <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>. bands: or, companies
At <S%H2676>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto thee because of thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
I am a <S%H2270>companion<s%> of all them that <S%H3372>fear<s%> thee, and of them that <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, is <S%H4390>full<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>: <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
TETH. Thou hast <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
<S%H3925>Teach<s%> me <S%H2898>good<s%> <S%H2940>judgment<s%> and <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: for I have <S%H539>believed<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
Before I was <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> I went <S%H7683>astray<s%>: but now have I <S%H8104>kept<s%> thy <S%H565>word<s%>.
Thou art <S%H2896>good<s%>, and doest <S%H2895>good<s%>; <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H2950>forged<s%> a <S%H8267>lie<s%> against me: but I will <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
Their <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as <S%H2954>fat<s%> as <S%H2459>grease<s%>; but I <S%H8173>delight<s%> in thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
It is <S%H2896>good<s%> for me that I have been <S%H6031>afflicted<s%>; that I might <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
The <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> unto me than <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%>.
JOD. Thy <S%H3027>hands<s%> have <S%H6213>made<s%> me and <S%H3559>fashioned<s%> me: give me <S%H995>understanding<s%>, that I may <S%H3925>learn<s%> thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%>.
They that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee will be <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> me; because I have <S%H3176>hoped<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, that thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are <S%H6664>right<s%>, and that thou in <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> hast <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> me. right: Heb. righteousness
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful <S%H2617>kindness<s%> be for my <S%H5162>comfort<s%>, according to thy <S%H565>word<s%> unto thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>. for: Heb. to comfort me
Let thy tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> unto me, that I may <S%H2421>live<s%>: for thy <S%H8451>law<s%> is my <S%H8191>delight<s%>.
Let the <S%H2086>proud<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>; for they dealt <S%H5791>perversely<s%> with me without a <S%H8267>cause<s%>: but I will <S%H7878>meditate<s%> in thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
Let those that <S%H3373>fear<s%> thee <S%H7725>turn<s%> unto me, and those that have <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H3045><s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
Let my <S%H3820>heart<s%> be <S%H8549>sound<s%> in thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>; that I be not <S%H954>ashamed<s%>.
CAPH. My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3615>fainteth<s%> for thy <S%H8668>salvation<s%>: but I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> for thy <S%H565>word<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When wilt thou <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me?
For I am become like a <S%H4997>bottle<s%> in the <S%H7008>smoke<s%>; yet do I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H2706>statutes<s%>.
How many are the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>? when wilt thou <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> on them that <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me?
The <S%H2086>proud<s%> have <S%H3738>digged<s%> <S%H7882>pits<s%> for me, which are not after thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
All thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> are <S%H530>faithful<s%>: they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> me <S%H8267>wrongfully<s%>; <S%H5826>help<s%> thou me. faithful: Heb. faithfulness
They had <S%H4592>almost<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> me upon <S%H776>earth<s%>; but I <S%H5800>forsook<s%> not thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
<S%H2421>Quicken<s%> me after thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>; so shall I <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
LAMED. For <S%H5769>ever<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, thy <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H5324>settled<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

Thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> is unto <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>: thou hast <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it <S%H5975>abideth<s%>. unto: Heb. to generation and generation abideth: Heb. standeth
They <S%H5975>continue<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> according to thine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>: for all are thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
<S%H3884>Unless<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%> had been my <S%H8191>delights<s%>, I should then have <S%H6>perished<s%> in mine <S%H6040>affliction<s%>.
I will <S%H5769>never<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>: for with them thou hast <S%H2421>quickened<s%> me.
I am thine, <S%H3467>save<s%> me; for I have <S%H1875>sought<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for me to <S%H6>destroy<s%> me: but I will <S%H995>consider<s%> thy <S%H5713>testimonies<s%>.
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> of all <S%H8502>perfection<s%>: but thy <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H7342>broad<s%>.
MEM. O how love <S%H157>I<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>! it is my <S%H7881>meditation<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%>.
Thou through thy <S%H4687>commandments<s%> hast made me <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: for they are <S%H5769>ever<s%> with me. they: Heb. it is ever with me
I have more <S%H7919>understanding<s%> than all my <S%H3925>teachers<s%>: for thy <S%H5715>testimonies<s%> are my <S%H7881>meditation<s%>.
I <S%H995>understand<s%> more than the <S%H2205>ancients<s%>, because I <S%H5341>keep<s%> thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%>.
I have <S%H3607>refrained<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from every <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H734>way<s%>, that I might <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
I have not <S%H5493>departed<s%> from thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>: for thou hast <S%H3384>taught<s%> me.
How <S%H4452>sweet<s%> are thy <S%H565>words<s%> unto my <S%H2441>taste<s%>! yea, sweeter than <S%H1706>honey<s%> to my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>! taste: Heb. palate
Through thy <S%H6490>precepts<s%> I get <S%H995>understanding<s%>: therefore I <S%H8130>hate<s%> every <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H734>way<s%>.
NUN. Thy <S%H1697>word<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> unto my <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and a <S%H216>light<s%> unto my <S%H5410>path<s%>. lamp: or, candle
I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%>, and I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> it, that I will <S%H8104>keep<s%> thy <S%H6664>righteous<s%> <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
I am <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> very <S%H3966>much<s%>: <S%H2421>quicken<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, according unto thy <S%H1697>word<s%>.
<S%H7521>Accept<s%>, I beseech thee, the freewill <S%H5071>offerings<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H3925>teach<s%> me thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%>.
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8548>continually<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>: yet do I not <S%H7911>forget<s%> thy <S%H8451>law<s%>.
